edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors

Class GetOutdoorsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.GetOutdoorsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GetOutdoorsManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    The main class for the GetOutdoors tools. Holds references to the top-level data structures and acts as the controller between the model and the GUI presentation view.
    Author:
    Jessica Young Schmidt, Your Name Here

    • Constructor Detail

      • GetOutdoorsManager

        public GetOutdoorsManager()
        Constructs the GetOutdoorsManager, performing the following actions: - A list of TraiLists is initialized, - A single ActivityList is created with this instance as its Observer. - A single ParkList is created with this instance as its Observer. - The boolean "changed" is set to false, indicating no change since last save.

    • Method Detail

      • isChanged

        public boolean isChanged()
        Returns whether the manager has changed since the last save. True if it has, false if not.
        Returns:
        returns true if manager has changed since last save; false otherwise.

      • setChanged

        public void setChanged(boolean changed)
        Sets the value of the "changed" field to the passed value, indicating whether or not the manager has changed since the last save.
        Parameters:
        changed - whether the manager has changed since the last save.

      • getFilename

        public java.lang.String getFilename()
        Returns the filename of the file that the manager is saving its data to.
        Returns:
        filename of the manager's save file.

      • setFilename

        public void setFilename(java.lang.String filename)
        Sets the save file's filename to the passed String, if valid. A valid filename must be non-empty, non-null, and contain at least one non-whitespace character. For valid Strings, leading and trailing whitespace will be trimmed. If the argument is invalid, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        filename - the new save file's filename.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is invalid.

        public boolean saveDataFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the GetOutdoorsManager to file.
        Parameters:
        filename - filename to save GetOutdoorsManager information to.
        Returns:
        true is saved successfully

      • addTrailList

        public int addTrailList(Park park)
        Adds the passed park's TrailList to the system's array of TrailLists. This manager instance is added as an Observer of the added TrailList.
        Parameters:
        park - the park to add the trail list to
        Returns:
        returns the index at which the new TrailList was added.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true is opened successfully

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable obs,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        If one of the manager's Observed objects (ActivityList, ParkList, or TrailList) changes, update() is called. If "obs" is the "parks" ParkList, the list is iterated through to check that each Park has a TrailList in "trailLists. If a park has no associated TrailList there, one is added. For each case, the manager notifies its observers of the change and sets "changed" to true.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        obs - the Observed object, who has just called notifyObservers().
